description(context=TrainingType).coloredWord:
Four different colored letters will be displayed.
Please answer with the displayed color, not the text.

You can choose from two answer methods.
・(Recommended) Answer with voice
・Answer from the options
description(context=TrainingType).themeShiritori:
Shiritori will be limited to the themes displayed in the options.Please continue to interact with AI as much as possible.

You can choose from two answer methods.
・(Recommended) Answer with voice
・Enter and answer
